type.name: org.gradle.api.reporting.CustomizableHtmlReport
type.description: A HTML Report whose generation can be customized with a XSLT stylesheet.

method.name: getStylesheet
method.description:
The stylesheet to use to generate the HTML report.

returns:the stylesheet to use to generate the HTML report

method.name: setStylesheet
method.description:
The stylesheet to use to generate the report.
param:stylesheet the stylesheet to use to generate the HTML report

property.name: stylesheet
property.description:
The stylesheet to use to generate the HTML report.

returns:the stylesheet to use to generate the HTML report
